activities.name: EMOM 3 Min - Burpees (Target: 10, Continue Mode)
activities.notes: TEST: Set EMOM Behavior to 'Continue on fail'. Complete less than 10 reps in any minute. Workout should continue and track failed minutes.

activities.name: EMOM 3 Min - Push-ups (Target: 15, Stop Mode)
activities.notes: TEST: Set EMOM Behavior to 'Stop workout on first fail'. Complete less than 15 reps in any minute. Workout should stop immediately with alert.

activities.name: EMOM 5 Min - Squats (Target: 12, Continue Mode)
activities.notes: TEST: Set EMOM Behavior to 'Continue on fail'. Fail multiple minutes (complete less than 12 reps). Should track all failures and continue through all 5 minutes.

roundGroups.name: Test 4: Stop Mode - Fail First Minute

activities.name: EMOM 5 Min - Pull-ups (Target: 8, Stop Mode)
activities.notes: TEST: Set EMOM Behavior to 'Stop workout on first fail'. Complete less than 8 reps in the FIRST minute. Workout should stop immediately.

activities.name: EMOM 3 Min - Jumping Jacks (Target: 20, Continue Mode)
activities.notes: TEST: Complete 20+ reps in each minute. Should complete all 3 minutes successfully with 0 failed minutes.

roundGroups.name: Test 6: No Reps Target (No Failure Checking)

activities.name: EMOM 3 Min - Mountain Climbers (No Target)
activities.notes: TEST: No reps target set. Should work normally without failure checking. Rep counter should not appear.
